html: Any politician that says #TCJA benefitted GM doesnt understand the tax law. Due to GM’s loss carry forward, no amount of tax cuts would reduce their tax liability. It's frustrating that opponents of the bill falsely claim that provisions in the bill impacted GM's decision.

html: Celebrating #NationalFarmersDay my staff visited Shoup Farms in Wayne County. Tight-knit farm families like the Shoup’s are the heart and soul of our country, and I’m glad that my staff and I could learn about all of the great work they do.pic.twitter.com/cf9slrZwaI

html: Members of Team Renacci had the chance to visit Clardale Dairy Farms in Stark County. Clardale is home to almost 700 cattle, and the milk produced there serves thousands of Ohioans every day. html: H.R. 3956, the Simplifying Technical Aspects Regarding Seasonality (STARS) Act, would amend the tax code to exclude seasonal employees from the definition of "full-time employee" for purposes of the employer mandate to provide employees health care coverage.
text: H.R. 3956, the Simplifying Technical Aspects Regarding Seasonality (STARS) Act, would amend the tax code to exclude seasonal employees from the definition of "full-time employee" for purposes of the employer mandate to provide employees health care coverage.

html: Talking ACA and as a small business owner for over 30 years, I know how difficult it can be to navigate our complex tax code & the onerous costs associated with compliance which is why I introduced H.R. 3956 / STARS via @FrantzRadio https://bit.ly/2PhwuEc

html: Today, I joined 80+ colleagues in the House sending a letter to the Senate VA Committee urging them to pass H.R. 299, the Blue Water Navy Vietnam Veterans Act. text: Today, I joined 80+ colleagues in the House sending a letter to the Senate VA Committee urging them to pass H.R. 299, the Blue Water Navy Vietnam Veterans Act. text:
Did you know?

@Indians legend Larry Doby led a humble, yet courageous life. His achievements in helping break the color barrier in professional sports make him worthy of the highest civilian award that Congress can offer.pic.twitter.com/uKQQKeXljD

html: Did you know? In addition to his storied baseball career, @Indians legend Larry Doby served in the @USNavy during World War II. Doby took time away from professional sports in order to serve his country, eventually being stationed in the Pacific Theater.pic.twitter.com/P1RRFEOCYc
text:
Did you know? 

In addition to his storied baseball career, @Indians legend Larry Doby served in the @USNavy during World War II. Doby took time away from professional sports in order to serve his country, eventually being stationed in the Pacific Theater.pic.twitter.com/P1RRFEOCYc

html: Huge thanks to my colleagues who helped make this day possible. Doby helped lead the @Indians to the 1948 World Series. He appeared in 7 All-Star games & went on to become only the 2nd African American to become a manager prior to being inducted into the @MLB Hall of Fame in 98.

html: Just like any parent, I am glad to see that our @POTUS signed an EO to allow immigrant families to stay together after crossing the border, however, this is just a band-aid. Congress has the opportunity NOW to permanently solve this problem and secure our borders.
text: Just like any parent, I am glad to see that our @POTUS signed an EO to allow immigrant families to stay together after crossing the border, however, this is just a band-aid. Congress has the opportunity NOW to permanently solve this problem and secure our borders.

html: We simply can't separate children from their parents when they are detained. If we are going to enforce our immigration laws while keeping families intact we have to change the existing law and Congress can and must act now.pic.twitter.com/3KAanjwbSE
text: We simply can't separate children from their parents when they are detained. If we are going to enforce our immigration laws while keeping families intact we have to change the existing law and Congress can and must act now.pic.twitter.com/3KAanjwbSE

html: With the labor market nearing full employment, last week's new applications for U.S. unemployment benefits dropped by 9,000, according to the @USDOL. text:
With the labor market nearing full employment, last week's new applications for U.S. unemployment benefits dropped by 9,000, according to the @USDOL.

The four-week moving average of continuing claims also fell to the lowest level since Jan. 1974.

html: 2017 has been a special one for our nation, from inaugurating our @POTUS to fixing the tax code. Personally, I was able to see my mom turn 91, celebrate my 34th wedding anniversary with Tina, & watch my son get married. Wishing you all had a great 2017, & an even better 2018.pic.twitter.com/UeudoZtwaY
text:
2017 has been a special one for our nation, from inaugurating our  @POTUS to fixing the tax code.

Wishing you all had a great 2017, & an even better 2018.pic.twitter.com/UeudoZtwaY

html: Eliminating the three-day stay requirement is supported by both hospitals and nursing homes throughout the country. This legislation will serve patients w/ more accurately designated care & reduces $$ by relying less on the expensive inpatient hospital setting.
text: Eliminating the three-day stay requirement is supported by both hospitals and nursing homes throughout the country. This legislation will serve patients w/ more accurately designated care & reduces $$ by relying less on the expensive inpatient hospital setting.

html: We will talk about The Creating Access to Rehabilitation for Every Senior (CARES) Act. My bipartisan bill that will eliminate the 3-day inpatient hospital stay requirement for Medicare beneficiaries who are in need of skilled nursing facility (SNF) services.
text: We will talk about The Creating Access to Rehabilitation for Every Senior (CARES) Act. My bipartisan bill that will eliminate the 3-day inpatient hospital stay requirement for Medicare beneficiaries who are in need of skilled nursing facility (SNF) services.
